import React, {useState} from 'react' import {PostsList} from './list' import {apiPostCreate} from './lookup' import {PostCreate} from './create' export function PostsComponent(props) { const [newPosts, setNewPosts] = useState([]) //create variables newPosts and setNewPosts const canPost = props.canPost === "false" ? false : true const handleNewPost = (newPost) => { let tempNewPosts = [...newPosts] //create variable tempNewPosts and set it to newPosts array tempNewPosts.unshift(newPost) //add new element to tempnewposts array, response should bring back actual post setNewPosts(tempNewPosts) //change the state of setNewPosts to tempNewPosts } return
{canPost === true && }
}
